emailInUse: The email is already in use
name: Your Name
enterName: Enter a name for your pofile

dateFormatError: The Date is not in the correct Date Format
clickImage: Click on the Image to choose a profile picture
dontGo: There are a lot of people out there that want to talk with you!
anyQuestions: If you have Questions, Problems or Feedback, send a email to:
whatIsShufflechatAnswer: Shufflechat is an app with which you can meet new people or have the opportunity to chat with people you don't know yet.
shuffleChatWorldWideQuestion: Can I use Shufflechat from all around the world?
shuffleChatWorldWideAnswer: Yes, as long as you have internet, you can use Shufflechat from wherever you want. Shufflechat is currently available in 2 languages, but more are being added.
shuffleChatNewsQuestion: Where can I find out about news and future updates?
shuffleChatNewsAnswer: On Instagram under the Shufflechat account and soon on the Shufflechat website.
dataQuestion: What kind of data is Shufflechat saving?
dataAnswer: Only the data you have in your account! And you can delete your account at any time.
dataThirdPartyQuestion: Will my data be passed on to third parties?
dataThirdPartyAnswer: No. Shufflechat doesn't share your data with third parties.
dataDeleteQuestion: How can I delete my data?
dataDeleteAnswer: By pressing the big red button on your profile page.
freeAnswer: Yes, the main feature is completely free, you can chat with as many people as you want without spending a penny. Only the premium function costs something.
premiumQuestion: What does the premium subscription include?
premiumAnswer: The premium subscription currently includes 3 filters (age, gender and interests) and more filters will be added, such as the filter "Region". So you can talk to people from your dream country and get to know their language and culture.
cancelQuestion: How can I cancel my subscription?
cancelAnswer:
You can cancel your subscription at any time. 
 
IOS: 
Open the Settings app. 
Tap on your name. 
Tap "Subscriptions". 
Tap on the subscription you want to manage 
Tap "Cancel subscription". If you don't see "Cancel Subscription", the subscription has already been canceled and will not be renewed. 

Android: 
Open the Google Play Store on your smartphone or tablet. 
Check that you are signed in to the correct Google Account . 
Tap on the three-line menu Subscriptions. 
Select the subscription you want to cancel. 
Tap on Cancel Subscription.
moneyBackQuestion: I am not happy, how do I get my money back?
moneyBackAnswer: Write an email to support@shufflechat.com with the subject and the reason why you want to cancel the purchase. We will then get back to you.
newUpdatesQuestion: Are there any new features coming for this app?
newUpdatesAnswer: Yes, a lot are planned, if you have ideas please send them to the email above.
photoQuestion: What do I have to consider with my photo?
photoAnswer:
The picture must follow the user guidlines.
Accounts with a sexual, racist or hateful picture or name will be blocked.
userQuestion: Who is allowed to use Shufflechat?
technicalQuestion: What should I do if I have technical problems with the app?
technicalAnswer:
Send a message to the above email with the appropriate subject. 
Describe in the message what the problem is and what device you are using (e.g. "Iphone 11").
